mapper.select: select * from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 and account=#{account} and receiveEmail=#{receiveEmail} and status=#{status} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_emailnotifyproduct where 1=1 and account=#{account} and receiveEmail=#{receiveEmail} and status=#{status}
select * from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 and sendFailureCount<3 and account=#{account} and receiveEmail=#{receiveEmail} and status=#{status} order by id desc
mapper.update: update t_emailnotifyproduct set id=#{id} ,account=#{account} ,receiveEmail=#{receiveEmail} ,productID=#{productID} ,productName=#{productName} ,createdate=#{createdate} ,notifydate=now() ,status=#{status} ,sendFailureCount=#{sendFailureCount} ,sendFailureCount=sendFailureCount+1 where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_emailnotifyproduct where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_emailnotifyproduct t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
